select car_group_id as carGroupId, car_group_name as carGroupName, car_group_code as carGroupCode,owner_org as ownerOrg, eo.dept_name ownerOrgName, company_id as ownerCompany, e1.dept_name as ownerCompanyName, state,city from car_group_info left join ecmp_org eo on eo.dept_id=owner_org left join ecmp_org e1 on e1.dept_id=company_id
state != 'S444'
and (car_group_name like concat('%',#{search},'%') or car_group_code like concat('%',#{search},'%'))
and state = #{state}
and company_id = #{deptId} and parent_car_group_id = 0
and parent_car_group_id = #{carGroupId}
order by car_group_name

select car_group_id as carGroupId, car_group_name as carGroupName, car_group_code as carGroupCode,owner_org as ownerOrg, state,city from car_group_info inner join ecmp_org on car_group_info.owner_org = ecmp_org.dept_id where ecmp_org.dept_id = #{deptId} and state != 'S444'
select car_group_id as carGroupId,car_group_name as carGroupName, telephone from car_group_info where city = #{cityCode} and state = 'Y000'

SELECT DISTINCTROW cgi.* FROM driver_info dri LEFT JOIN car_group_driver_relation cgd ON cgd.driver_id=dri.driver_id LEFT JOIN car_group_info cgi ON cgi.car_group_id=cgd.car_group_id WHERE 1=1 AND cgi.car_group_id IS NOT NULL AND dri.driver_id=#{driverId}
select car_group_id as deptId, car_group_name as deptName from car_group_info where company_id = #{deptId} and parent_car_group_id = 0 and state != 'S444'
select car_group_id as deptId, car_group_name as deptName from car_group_info where parent_car_group_id = #{carGroupId} and state != 'S444'
SELECT car_group_code FROM car_group_info where state != 'S444'
select count(1) from car_group_info where parent_car_group_id = #{parentId} and state != 'S444'
select distinct car_group_name from car_group_info where company_id = #{owneCompany} and state != 'S444'

select car_group_id carGroupId,car_group_name carGroupName,car_group_code carGroupCode,owner_company ownerCompany,owner_org ownerOrg from car_group_info where car_group_id in (select car_group_id from car_group_dispatcher_info where user_id=#{userId}) or parent_car_group_id in (select car_group_id from car_group_dispatcher_info where user_id=#{userId})
